title: Is N. Awasthi, Neeraj Kumar, and NCERT enough for the JEE Advanced? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: ncert is enough for inorganic only and that too it’s not completely sufficient as Advance syllabus has additional topics which are not in ncert. For physical and organic Ncert is a complete joke so stay away i don’t know which book is Neeraj Kumar . N avasthi is perfect for physical chem practice
